case_title: NABI BAKHSH and others vs HOTE MUHAMMAD and others

accussed_details.name: NABI BAKHSH
allegation: Filed review petition challenging the decision of the Board of Revenue.

complaint_summary: Petitioners filed a review petition under Section 8 of the Board of Revenue Act, 1957, challenging the order dated 10-2-1987, which accepted the revision petition of the respondents.
investigation_summary: The case involved disputes over amendments in Khatas as part of a Consolidation Scheme. Petitioners claimed they were not given a fair hearing and sought to amend the list of parties involved.
judgment_summary: The court rejected the review petition, noting that petitioners Nos. 2 to 9 had submitted affidavits stating satisfaction with the prior decision. The review petition was deemed infructuous as most petitioners wanted to withdraw it.
legal_arguments: Petitioners argued they were not afforded an opportunity of being heard and the case was decided ex parte.
Respondents contended that petitioners Nos. 2 to 9 were satisfied with the prior decision and did not file the review petition.
key_issues: Whether the petitioners were denied a fair hearing.
Whether the amendments in Khatas were justified under the Consolidation Scheme.

legal_terms.Consolidation Scheme: A legal process to reorganize land holdings for efficiency.

words_and_phrases.Ex parte: A decision made without one party being present.

summary_vector_notes: The case revolves around a review petition filed under Section 8 of the Board of Revenue Act, 1957, challenging amendments in land records as part of a Consolidation Scheme. The court rejected the petition, citing affidavits from petitioners Nos. 2 to 9 expressing satisfaction with the prior decision. Legal arguments focused on procedural fairness and the validity of amendments under the scheme.

review_petition.grounds: Ex parte decision, incorrect impleading of parties
review_petition.petitioners_request: Set aside order dated 1987-02-10 and decide revision afresh
review_petition.respondents_rebuttal: Affidavits submitted indicating satisfaction with the decision

final_decision.application_rejected: Petitioner No. 1's application to implead parties as respondents
final_decision.reason_for_rejection: Most petitioners wanted to withdraw the review petition
